page.title: 19THE BMX TRACK
page.content: Since the Play Area, Page 16, was written, the Cycle Track at one end of the area has been prepared. As this is not intended to be a supervised club activity, it has been left in a simple but safe condition, with a turn at one end, banked up with soil, jumps and a deep hollow scooped out on one side. On Friday, 26th. July, the school holidays began, and the Dover Boys' Brigade arrived in the village for their annual camp, bringing the rain with them. Their leader rides a B.M.X. bike with the Folkestone Fliers, so soon took an interest in the track. On Tuesday, 30th. June, the evening air was disturbed by the voices of many youngsters shouting encouragement, as the Boys' Brigade took on the local boys in a B.M.X. competition. The Track is proving a success, worthy of the effort and expense put into it.
